fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 gained 42.10 points or 0.24% to settle at 17,599.15. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, tumbled 4.95% to 11.80. Reliance Industries (RIL), ICICI Bank and HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The April 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 April 2023.
